dmca.title: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] illegal use of name]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: JLavoie893@aol.com [mailto:JLavoie893@aol.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2006 11:50 AM
To: legal-response2@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] illegal use of name]


How can you say this is not against the law?  They are using copyright
photos.  Your company will also be sued for not removing the images seeing
that you are hosting this site.  I am giving 24 hours for the website to be
removed and if it is not, a legal suit will be started.
